long_description: Vestal Guide Watch with altimeter, barometer and compass has premium, multi-sensor movement with a waterproof stainless-steel case and scratch-resistant crystal for river crossings or thunderstorms. Altimeter features instant read-out along with an elevation-gain graph. Barometer alerts you if your summit attempt is a poor decision with the storm warning indicator. Digital compass with bidirectional rotating bezel holds your bearing for quick reference. Digital thermometer. 22mm-wide polyurethane strap features the OKTOLOCK system and a 316L surgical-grade, stainless-steel buckle to keep the watch secured to your wrist through thick and thin. Case, strap and buckle connection points feature screw-down, stainless-steel parts for added durability. The Vestal Guide Multifunction Watch resists water to 100m (330 ft.). Comes in custom packaging with a titanium Survivor whistle.
short_description: Vestal Guide Watch with altimeter, barometer and compass has premium, multi-sensor movement with a waterproof stainless-steel case and scratch-resistant crystal for river crossings or thunderstorms.
